com.application.rucafe.Adapter

Class Cart_Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<Cart_Adapter.ViewHolder>
      • com.application.rucafe.Adapter.Cart_Adapter

  • public class Cart_Adapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<Cart_Adapter.ViewHolder>
    This class provides the functionality of adapter of cart. Show orders of Coffee or Donut.
    Author:
    Kiernan King and Ahmed Alghazwi
